turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Federation of Damanhur.
turn.1: What are the main classes of people living in Federation of Damanhur?
turn.2: (page 102, Merrifield, 2006) Class A & B citizens participate fully in The School of Meditation, Social, and the Game of Life.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Class C citizens participate fully in The School of Meditation.
turn.5: What are the main sources of income for each of the classes?
turn.6: Citizens participate in one of several ways, depending on their personal nature.
turn.7: What are the main types of jobs in each of the classes?
turn.8: Ways include the Way of the Oracle, the Way of the Monk, the Way of the Knight, the Way of Health, the Way of the Word, the Way of Art & Work, and many others.
turn.9: What is the typical house hold size for each of the classes?
turn.10: Most citizens live in houses of 10-20 people each, federated together into the Federation of Damanhur.
turn.11: Are the people easy going or more active?
turn.12: Marriage works on a renewal basis, for a period of so many years before renewal.
